m_szDocSumamry: News:2012:Cold Fusion Cold Fusion in the News News relating to Cold Fusion, also called Low Energy Nuclear Reactions (LENR). See other Cold Fusion news services: Cold Fusion Times | Cold Fusion Now | Current Featured / Best Exotic FE : Nuclear > Cold Fusion > LENR-to-Market Weekly -- January 24(5), 2013 - Highlights this week include: Piantelli gets CF patent, Rossi rebuffs; Cold Fusion 1.01 MIT course report week 1; E-Cat independent testing issues -- probably delay; Ed Storms: "most ideal energy you could possibly imagine"; CF updates at 22Passi. (PESN; January 24, 2013) Featured / Best Exot
